title: 14 days suspension which was a clearly mistake, riot were are you?
body:

Then after the game I got a 14 days suspension for one game that had 0 toxicity, and a joyful game, I haven't played any games except this one, and the system banned my exactly for this one game which was a delusional reason, I have been submitting tickets to riot but no one is responding, I have been waiting for  4 days , heres my evidence, the link to my game preview ban : http://prntscr.com/oac28h

replies.body:
Riot has zero-tolerance for racist behavior, this type of language is always subject to an immediate 14-day suspension.

 If you were in a full 5 man premade there's a very, _very_ slim chance this could be reduced if you filed a support ticket, although I wouldn't count on it.

 If there were any randoms on your team or this was in all chat, there's no chance of this being removed or reduced in any way.

But I wasn't being racist, the enemy had a troll name, and he was fine with it , I don't get how is this a reason to get 14 days banned, I haven't even been warned, its not the point were I get a 14 days suspension, and yes I was in a 5 man premade team

Even if that person was comfortable with it there are still 4-5+ other players in the match outside of your premade who may have been uncomfortable with it. 

And even if that wasn't the case the bottom line is that this type of behavior is against the rules. It doesn't really matter if the player is comfortable with the racism, Riot doesn't want racism in any capacity on their platform.
But how was I supposed to know that?, its literally my first time ever using it, and I never knew it was related to toxicity and bans, I was just having fun

Aside from a loading screen tip that specifically says _"Competitive BSing is fine. Hate speech? Not so much."_, it can also be found on the [Riot support website,](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752884-Reporting-a-Player#h1q1) in the [Summoner's Code,](https://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/game-info/get-started/summoners-code/) and in a mountain of Boards/Reddit posts if you google "League of Legends racism" or "League of Legends hate speech".

But isn't this an Europe server? so how is chineese people related to game, second of all the quote u gave me says hate speech, and no one hated it in first place. I never searched for league of legends racism cause no one does lets be honest. Put yourself in my place, your playing a normal game , and u were just having fun , no one got hurt, then you get banned for it, but hey if it was a streamer or any youtuber he would flame for 10 games and still not get banned.

> But isn't this an Europe server? 

 Whether it was on the EU or NA servers, Riot's rules are universal. 

It doesn't matter where you play, rules are rules.

>so how is chineese people related to game, 

 League of Legends is owned by Tencent, a Chinese company, in addition to being very popular with the Asian community. 

It's not about the specific culture or ethnicity however, racism is unacceptable as a whole.

>second of all the quote u gave me says hate speech, and no one hated it in first place.

 "Hate speech" is the formal term for racism. They're synonymous.

>I never searched for league of legends racism cause no one does lets be honest. 

I'm just saying the information was available to you from the jump. Racism is unacceptable in most situations, it shouldn't have come as a surprise that there might be a punishment given if you were to use it.

>Put yourself in my place, your playing a normal game , and u were just having fun , no one got hurt, then you get banned for it, 

 Well, I wouldn't be in that situation in the first place. However, if I were to engage in that sort of behavior, I would know that it's taboo and I might get punished for it. Having fun at someone else's expense goes against the Summoner's Code and is just wrong in general. 

>but hey if it was a streamer or any youtuber he would flame for 10 games and still not get banned.


 Even if that were the case and a streamer showed this type of blatant racism and went unpunished {by the way, research [_Pants are Dragon_](https://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/6jp2go/pants_are_dragon_calls_his_teammate_the_n_word/)} that still doesn't justify your own behavior. 

 Sorry dude. This punishment is most likely going to stay no matter what you do, you can choose to learn from it and improve your behavior or go back to your old ways and receive a permanent suspension. It's your call.

The reason for your punishment was that you sent several blatantly racist chat messages, which escalates you to an immediate 14-day suspension.
